title: General News Article
description: Template for a standard news article or general article

fields.title: Headline
fields.description: The main title of the article

list.title: Subheadline
list.description: An optional subtitle providing additional context

list.title: Author
list.description: Name of the person who wrote the article, Full name of the author

list.title: Publication Date
list.description: Date when the article was published,in DD/MM/YYYY format

list.title: Introduction
list.description: The opening paragraph or summary of the article, A brief overview of what the article is about

list.title: Main Content
list.description: The body of the article, Detailed content of the article, including all paragraphs

list.title: Context
list.description: Background or historical context related to the article,Information that helps understand the situation discussed

list.title: Article Position
list.description: The stance or perspective presented in the article,Interpretation of the article's position on the subject matter

list.title: Data & Evidence
list.description: Any data or evidence presented in the article (Relevant statistics, studies, or expert opinions

list.title: Conclusion
list.description: The final paragraph summarizing the article's main points,Wrap-up or final thoughts on the article's topic

list.title: References
list.description: Any sources or references cited in the article,List of external references used to support the article's content

tables.title: Any table
tables.description: Any table present in the article
